# These are the best Bluetooth speakers of 2019

[TJ Donegan and ](http://www.usatoday.com/staff/2646271001/tj-donegan/)[Lee
Neikirk](http://www.usatoday.com/staff/2647072001/lee-neikirk/),  Published
1:43 p.m. ET June 4, 2019 | Updated 3:48 p.m. ET July 10, 2019

![facebook share](https://www.gannett-cdn.com/uxstatic/usatoday/usat-web-
static-5015.54.0/images/social-icons/oval-1-facebook.png)[![twitter
share](https://www.gannett-cdn.com/uxstatic/usatoday/usat-web-
static-5015.54.0/images/social-icons/oval-1-copy-
twitter.png)](https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=https%3A//www.usatoday.com/story/tech/reviewedcom/2019/06/04/these-
best-bluetooth-speakers-right-
now/1339893001/&text=These%20are%20the%20best%20Bluetooth%20speakers%20of%202019&via=usatoday)![email
share](https://www.gannett-cdn.com/uxstatic/usatoday/usat-web-
static-5015.54.0/images/social-icons/oval-1-copy-3-email.png)

![The best waterproof Bluetooth speakers of 2019](https://www.gannett-
cdn.com/presto/2019/05/29/USAT/5f8bb326-2f59-440e-a3e4-a6a846130bf3-DSC_0745_1.jpg?width=580&height=326&fit=bounds&auto=webp)

The best waterproof Bluetooth speakers of 2019 (Photo: Reviewed / Betsey
Goldwasser)

 _— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you
need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small
share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA
Today’s newsroom and any business incentives._

The weather is getting warmer, and hopefully that means it's time for summer
fun: cookouts, trips to the beach, hikes, and time spent beside the pool. One
thing that will drastically improve all those things? A portable speaker that
can play your favorite music.

We've spent months testing dozens of the most popular and highly-rated
speakers on the market. We talked to manufacturers, we read hundreds of user
reviews, and we conducted our own in-house testing to find the best Bluetooth
speaker right now—including everything from cheap $30 models to higher-end
waterproof ones.

These are the best Bluetooth speakers you can buy:

## Best For Most People: JBL Flip 4

![JBL Flip 4](https://www.gannett-
cdn.com/-mm-/00328455916bb45ca99246179b52b99baca14f7b/c=0-0-642-361/local/-/media/2019/06/05/USATODAY/usatsports/Reviewed.com-
RvEW-22825-PortableSpeaker.jpg?width=580&height=326&fit=crop)

JBL Flip 4 (Photo: Reviewed / Betsey Goldwasser)

The [JBL Flip 4 ($75 on
sale)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01MSYQWNY/ref=as_li_ss_tl?_encoding=UTF8&th=1&linkCode=sl1&tag=usatsyndication-20&linkId=7bf256f60dd75559a27b3aa5c6e8adea&language=en_US)
isn't the cheapest speaker we tested, but there's a reason: it sounds awesome,
it's waterproof, and it boasts beefier battery life than smaller options. It's
so good we named it the Best Overall in our roundups of both the [best
portable](https://www.reviewed.com/televisions/best-right-now/the-best-
portable-bluetooth-speakers) and the [best waterproof Bluetooth
speakers](https://www.reviewed.com/televisions/best-right-now/the-best-
waterproof-bluetooth-speakers).

From the knock-resistant hard plastic chassis to the cleanly spaced volume,
play, and Bluetooth buttons, the Flip 4 stands out from the collective a bit
in terms of pure polish and quality. It's not the loudest speaker on the list
but it provides a good balance of bass, midtones, and treble frequencies. It's
lighter than smaller speakers, which definitely adds to its overall
portability, and is available in a wide range of colors like blue, red, teal,
and even camo (yikes).

If you need waterproofing, outdoorsy sturdiness, good volume, and the ability
to connect more than one Bluetooth source at a time, the Flip 4 is one of the
best choices. It also delivers more impressive, rumbling bass than almost
anything else we tested. No matter how you plan to use it—indoor, outdoor,
dry, wet, stationary, or in motion—the Flip 4 delivers the goods.

 **[Get the JBL Flip 4 at Amazon for
$74.](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01MSYQWNY/ref=as_li_ss_tl?_encoding=UTF8&th=1&linkCode=sl1&tag=usatsyndication-20&linkId=7bf256f60dd75559a27b3aa5c6e8adea&language=en_US)95**

## Best Cheap Bluetooth Speaker: Anker Soundcore 2

![Kick your spontaneous dance party up a notch.](https://www.gannett-
cdn.com/presto/2019/06/04/USAT/e7bc0e3c-40d2-4692-b18d-ba1d5ee73d61-anker-
soundcore.jpg?width=580&height=326&fit=bounds&auto=webp)

Kick your spontaneous dance party up a notch. (Photo: Reviewed / Betsey
Goldwasser)

If you just want an affordable, waterproof Bluetooth speaker with no gimmicks,
the [**Anker Soundcore 2 ($29.99 on sale)**](https://www.amazon.com/Upgraded-
Anker-Soundcore-Bluetooth-
Waterproof/dp/B01MTB55WH/ref=as_li_ss_tl?SubscriptionId=AKIAJIYMMIJN7RU7KVJQ&th=1&linkCode=sl1&tag=usatsyndication-20&linkId=c4d8b23d48435a65db19334d8ca23987&language=en_US)
is the way to go. It features a sturdy rectangular design with big, easy-to-
push buttons and a very tightly sealed set of inputs, including USB for
charging and a 3.5mm aux port for audio.

The first thing I noticed about the SoundCore 2 was its sound quality. For
being small, portable, and fairly lightweight—not to mention cheap at under
$50—it has less tinniness in its trebles and more bass presence than other
speakers.

Between the low price point and the wide array of colors, it's the best
Bluetooth speaker for the money, bar none. It doesn't get incredibly loud, but
it's enough for a party or small barbecue—all without a touch of distortion.

Most impressive? It's waterproof (rated to IPX7, which you can learn more
about in our guide to [what waterproof ratings actually
mean](https://www.reviewed.com/headphones/features/what-do-waterproof-and-
water-resistant-really-mean)), a big improvement over the original Anker
Soundcore, which was already one of the best cheap Bluetooth speakers of all
time. If you want a Bluetooth speaker on a budget, this is the one to get.

[ **Get the Anker Soundcore 2 at Amazon for $29.99 with
coupon**](https://www.amazon.com/Upgraded-Anker-Soundcore-Bluetooth-
Waterproof/dp/B01MTB55WH/ref=as_li_ss_tl?SubscriptionId=AKIAJIYMMIJN7RU7KVJQ&th=1&linkCode=sl1&tag=usatsyndication-20&linkId=c4d8b23d48435a65db19334d8ca23987&language=en_US)

 **Other Bluetooth Speakers We Liked**

[ **Aomis Sport II ($32.99 with coupon at
Amazon)**](https://www.amazon.com/AOMAIS-Portable-Wireless-Bluetooth-
Waterproof/dp/B01K9NLCV8/ref=as_li_ss_tl?psc=1&SubscriptionId=AKIAJIYMMIJN7RU7KVJQ&linkCode=sl1&tag=usatsyndication-20&linkId=781c6652e5c73a7de77cbd5cf0d2b482&language=en_US):
This was a surprisingly good, cheap Bluetooth speaker that came in second in
our roundup of the [best cheap Bluetooth
speakers](https://www.reviewed.com/televisions/best-right-now/the-best-cheap-
portable-bluetooth-speakers). We'd recommend going with the Anker Soundcore or
the waterproof Soundcore 2, but this is a good alternative—just clip the on-
page coupon to get the price this low.

[ **Bose Soundlink Revolve ($179 at Amazon)**](https://www.amazon.com/Bose-
SoundLink-Portable-
Bluetooth-739523-1110/dp/B06XCQKTKR/ref=as_li_ss_tl?keywords=soundlink+revolve&qid=1559669532&s=electronics&sr=1-4&linkCode=sl1&tag=usatsyndication-20&linkId=6c42bff6d8d33330bc931865b6386b6c&language=en_US):
This Bose wireless Bluetooth speaker has a lot going for it, including
excellent sound quality and a cool design. But it's also $179 on Amazon right
now—the [newest Bose Revolve+ is actually even more expensive at
$249](https://www.amazon.com/Bose-SoundLink-Portable-Long-Lasting-
Bluetooth/dp/B06XCW4VFS/ref=as_li_ss_tl?keywords=soundlink+revolve&qid=1559669532&s=electronics&sr=1-3&linkCode=sl1&tag=usatsyndication-20&linkId=5148495f2184f475c2b4384229db1a97&language=en_US).
We just think the JBL Flip 4 is a better option for the money. The Bose will
sound better in most instances, but for nearly three times the price that's a
tough sell.

[Anker Soundcore Flare+ ($99.99 at Amazon)](https://www.amazon.com/Soundcore-
Portable-Bluetooth-Waterproof-
Radiators/dp/B07F7VJN1G/ref=as_li_ss_tl?SubscriptionId=AKIAJIYMMIJN7RU7KVJQ&linkCode=sl1&tag=usatsyndication-20&linkId=710cecd95a267511bcce439266766d3c&language=en_US):
This $99.99 waterproof speaker ($79.99 on sale now and then) doesn't offer a
ton more than the other Soundcore models. But it has flashing LED lights on
the bottom that sync with your music, which might be worth it if you are using
this at a party.

_The product experts at[Reviewed](https://www.reviewed.com/) have all your
shopping needs covered with our lab-tested roundups of all the best products.
Follow Reviewed on [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/reviewed),
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/reviewed), and
[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/reviewed/)._

 _Prices are accurate at the time this article was published, but may change
over time._
